Reviews.Title: great Android smartphone
Reviews.Author: teresa evans
Reviews.Content: Great smartphone faster download easy to program I'm not good with I think like this long battery life i forgot  to charge my battery for 10 hours and it was still good but it need charging but I still have time. Love the phone
